violations_detected.title: Echo method not used
violations_detected.evidence: Customer provides name 'Александр' at 00:00:08.232-00:00:08.712, operator proceeds to next question without repeating name back or asking for confirmation

violations_detected.title: Long information search
violations_detected.evidence: Operator announces search 'Минуту, пожалуйста' at 00:02:46.120, provides response 'Спасибо за ожидание' at 00:03:47.062. Total duration 60.9 seconds exceeds 45-second threshold.

coaching_priorities.issue: Echo method not used for contact data collection
coaching_priorities.recommendation: Always repeat customer's name back and ask for confirmation ('Ваше имя Александр, верно?') when collecting contact information. This is critical for data accuracy.

coaching_priorities.issue: Search duration exceeded maximum allowed time
coaching_priorities.recommendation: Complex information searches must be completed within 40 seconds. If additional time is needed (40-45s), flag for improvement. Searches over 45 seconds require coaching. Consider having payment method information readily available or performing searches more efficiently.

7.1.evidence: Proper greeting format including company name '74 колеса', operator name 'Алина', and offer to help. Closing with 'Спасибо за звонок. Всего доброго. До свидания.' is correct.

7.2.evidence: Name 'Александр' collected without echo-back and confirmation request. Phone number and address were properly echoed with confirmation.
7.2.note: Critical violation for name collection - must always use echo method for all contact data

7.3.evidence: Intro at 3.552 seconds from call start (within 5s threshold). Disconnect at 3.4 seconds after last speech (within 5s threshold).

7.4.evidence: No instances of interruption without apology detected in transcript.

6.1.evidence: While there was a 60.9-second search, this is a 9.1 violation (not 6.1). Customer did not hang up and conversation continued throughout.

9.1.evidence: Search duration from 00:02:46.120 to 00:03:47.062 = 60.9 seconds, exceeding 45-second threshold.
9.1.note: Search was for payment method information

9.3.evidence: After search completion at 00:03:47.062, operator says 'Спасибо за ожидание' (Thank you for waiting), satisfying requirement.

3.1.evidence: Customer request to purchase tires was resolved. Order was formed with all specifications, payment method options explained, and pickup location agreed upon.

3.3.evidence: No confidential information (office numbers, internal codes, passwords) disclosed without authorization.

3.6.evidence: Tire specifications and pricing information provided appeared to be from system knowledge. No 'from memory' unverified information detected.

5.1.evidence: Complete information provided: tire specifications (225-45-18), brand (Fortuna Polara Ice), price (7110 rubles, 6399 with discount), pickup locations with addresses, and contact confirmation.

10.2.evidence: Script followed: greeting with company/operator names, systematic questioning about tire specifications, multiple product options presented, payment method discussion, address selection, order confirmation.

10.3.evidence: Customer name 'Александр' used consistently throughout call. Operator maintained professional rapport, handled customer's detailed questions patiently, and maintained conversation control throughout the 11+ minute call.

10.6.evidence: Comprehensive information delivered: tire specifications, multiple brand options with pricing, delivery options, payment methods, pickup addresses, and order confirmation with order number.

2.1.evidence: Call completed successfully. Order was processed and operator offered 'Чем-то ещё могу вам помочь?' (Can I help with anything else?) before closing.

1.1.evidence: No profanity, yelling, or harsh language detected in operator speech. Professional tone maintained throughout.

4.1.evidence: Customer was somewhat demanding with many questions about tire options and payment methods. Operator handled patiently without frustration, adapted communication style, and provided multiple solutions.

positive_observations: Professional greeting with company and operator name provided immediately
Systematic approach to tire specification collection (size, type, brand preferences)
Presented multiple tire options with pricing to accommodate customer preferences
Used echo method properly for phone number and address confirmation
Provided comprehensive delivery and payment method options
Maintained customer name usage throughout the call
Handled customer's complex questions about payment methods patiently and professionally
Confirmed all order details before closing (order number, confirmation)
Proper closing with thanks and offer for additional help
Long call duration (11+ minutes) demonstrates thorough service despite time pressure

data_quality.confidence_notes: Word-level JSON timestamps enabled precise detection of echo method violation and search duration timing. Transcription clarity is excellent throughout the call.
